publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1518 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill be allocated as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified period (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins) – Groups 1 and 2 – no later than 1 hour Groups 3 and 4 – no later than 1 hour 30 minutes Group 5 to Group 8 – no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 3 hours.
